effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 336,194 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 169,845.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 14,189 for 15 sec.
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 927,918 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Fists of Polar Fury

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.
